Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class MapRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.MapRouter

  • public class MapRouter
extends java.lang.Object
    The MapRouter class store a basic idea of the map. it marks the tiles as safe and unsafe based on obstacles.
